location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 418 x 310mm, on sheet 475 x 368mm

mods.abstract: The map shows Syria, Lebannon, and the parts of the neighbouring countries of Palestine, Transjordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, and Turkey. It indicates hydrology, international frontiers, standard gauge railways, narrow gauge railways, all weather roads, dry roads, and pipelines.The map was created by the Research Department of the Foreign Office, and it is Annex C of the paper 'Syria' (M.E. (O) W.P.3), prepared by the Working Party of the Middle East (Official) Committee (IOR/L/PS/12/4756 folios 271 to 295).
